narrative.narrative: Spantax were an airline based at Gran Canaria in the Canary Islands of Spain. They lasted from 1959-1988. Their full name was Spanish Air Taxi Las Areas.om Sabena.

prefereds.aircrafts: Convair 990,Convair 990A,Douglas DC-7C,Douglas DC-8-63,Douglas DC-9-30,Douglas DC-9-10,Douglas DC-9-15,MD DC-10-30,Boeing 737-200 Adv.,Boeing 747-200B,Douglas DC-6,Douglas DC-3
